title: DDFP 542: Darrelle Revis, Browns' long-term outlook & Bracket results
itunes:title: DDFP 542: Darrelle Revis, Browns' long-term outlook & Bracket results
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank for another edition of the DDFP Producer Conference, in which the fellas answer football and game of life questions from behind-the-glass. The guys also welcome back Producer Sully and review the results of round one of Shek's Best All-Time Position Group bracket. A sampling of today's questions: 1. Would Darrelle Revis be a good fit for the Steelers? 2. Will the Browns win a Super Bowl in Shek's lifetime? 3. How much did Shek pay in taxes back in 2005?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
